comment:
Most people aren‚Äôt shitting on Christopher Reeves or Michael Keaton. But it‚Äôs clear WB are actively trying to replace the shortly-lived legacy Henry Cavill and Ben Affleck. Flash‚Äôs first live action movie is looking like it‚Äôs going to be a mess. It does not make sense to bring Michael Keaton into the DCEU. At least for now. With Spiderman: No Way Home it‚Äôs different, because marvel and Sony set up and EARNED a multiverse crossover. WB is most likely just using cheap nostalgia tactics because they don‚Äôt know what the hell to do at this point.

And now you have the inclusion of Supergirl in Flash and the casting of a new superman. They‚Äôre throwing a bunch of random shit at the wall to see if it sticks. If I‚Äôm wrong I‚Äôm wrong but it‚Äôs hard to see any organization from WB right now. #restorethesnyderverse

I do agree about Amber Heard in Aquaman 2. I‚Äôm not paying to see it.

comment: Andy, why give these people the time of day? (other than the fact that drama sells) there's billions of people in the world and a big proportion of them are on social media, there is inevitably going to be a few people that have this opinion, it's just inevitable. Given the sheer amount of people in the world, any possible opinion you can have on a situation, you will be able to find someone that has that opinion. The best thing to do is to just ignore them and that will take their power away. This is our fault that these opinions spread because we give them the time of day. You complain about things like woke culture or cancel culture but you're the one that makes them a thing by making videos about them and spreading the opinion around instead of just ignoring it and moving on.

author: Maria Hernandez

comment:
These Snyderverse fans... who are NOT DC fans... are insufferable. 
The whole snyderverse sucks. Not just the Snyder trilogy. BUt they allowed Snyder to screw up the whole universe by casting the whole Justice league... HORRIBLY.
Gal Gadot... can't act... WW 1 was only decent by the grace of Chris Pine, Patty Jenkins, and a decent script. WW84... had Patty Jenkins thinking she was a writer so it sucked... and Gal sucks in Justice League.
Ezra Miller sucks as the Flash.
Ray Fisher is a whiney baby who can't get hired anywhere else cause he's not a good actor.
Dude-Bro Rock Star Aquaman is a mediocre character... but it's not Aquaman.
And Ben Affleck's Batman was the WORST. He was lame-o murder-man in BVS... and he was tired and burnt out SADffleck in Justice League.
Henry Cavill was NEVER Superman. He was just Man of Steel. Poor dude. He was clearly so pumped to finally play something resembling Superman in Justice League... but that was all ruined by mustaches, reshoots, and SnyderCuts.
Then Ayer ruined Joker with Suicide Squad.
The SnyderVerse is an epic fail as far as a connected movie universe goes, and even WORSE as a DC universe adaptation.
Put it out of it's misery already. Sigh.
